> Do we want to preserve filter expressions while fixing this bug? Or should we make [] access the same as dotted access?

I dunno... if we fork, I'd honestly prefer a different syntax or even a transform instead of the current override of `[]`, but it may not be worth our time.

In lieu of any more solid plans in that regard, I think we should preserve them.
